com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.server.interfaces
Interface SnowmanFlag

All Superinterfaces:
DynamicEntity, com.sun.sgs.app.ManagedObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
SnowmanFlagImpl
public interface SnowmanFlag
extends DynamicEntity

The SnowmanFlag interface defines the basic behavior of a flag in the snowman game.

Author:
Owen Kellett

Method Summary

          Called when a player holding the flag dies, or disconnects from the game.

Method Detail

getTeamColor

com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.common.protocol.enumn.ETeamColor getTeamColor()
Returns the color of the team that owns this flag.

Returns:
the flag's color

setHeldBy

void setHeldBy(SnowmanPlayer player)
This method sets the flag as held by a snowman. Passing null sets it as held by no snowman.

Parameters:
player - the snowman who holds the flag, or null

returnFlag

void returnFlag()
Relocates the flag to its original home position.

drop

void drop(float x,
          float y)
Called when a player holding the flag dies, or disconnects from the game. The flag is dropped and placed in the given fixed position in the world.

Parameters:
x - the x coordinate to drop the flag
y - the y coordinate to drop the flag

isHeld

boolean isHeld()
Checks if the flag is currently being held by a player.

Returns:
true if the flag is currently held

getGoalX

float getGoalX()
Returns the x coordinate of the goal location.

Returns:
the x coordinat of the goal location

getGoalY

float getGoalY()
Returns the y coordinate of the goal location.

Returns:
the y coordinate of the goal location
